question: Identify the social media engagement trends for major technology companies in the last year.

subtasks.task: Extract social media engagement metrics from Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and YouTube for major technology companies over the last year.
Analyze the engagement metrics by platform to identify which companies have the highest engagement rates (likes, comments, shares) in the past year.
Compare the social media engagement trends with the company revenue and market capitalization to assess the correlation between online presence and financial performance.
